text: Steyer may refer to: * Steyer (name), people with the surname ** Tom Steyer (born 1957), American asset manager, philanthropist and environmentalist * Steyer Opera House, a historic building in Decorah, Iowa, United States * Steyer Bridge, a historic structure in Decorah, Iowa, United States * Heinz- Steyer-Stadion, a football and athletics stadium in Dresden, Germany ==See also== * Steyr (disambiguation)
title: Steyer
